articles.title: Study finds co-infected individuals carrying two distinct lineages of SARS-CoV-2 in Argentina
articles.description: Researchers used molecular surveillance to identify cases of co-infection with SARS-CoV-2 variants of concern Delta and Omicron reported in Argentina during December 2021 and January 2022.

articles.title: Argentina government warns beef sector to help cut inflation or risk export bans
articles.description: By Maximilian HeathBUENOS AIRES, March 16 (Reuters) - Argentina's government warned slaughterhouses on Wednesday to do their part to help bring down domestic inflation or risk export bans on beef, underscoring rising tensions in the farm-driven South American country over spiraling prices.The government, which limited beef exports for periods last year, has broad agreements

articles.title: Apple Pay arrives in Argentina and Peru
articles.description: Apple Pay has arrived in Argentina and Peru.
articles.content:
Apple Pay has arrived in both Argentina and Peru.
First reported by pisapapeles, both countries now officially support one of the best iPhone and Apple Watch features available. Customers in both Argentina and Peru can now pay for items out and about... [882 chars]

articles.title: Apple Pay now available in Argentina and Peru, 'coming soon' to Chile
articles.description: In January, Apple announced Apple Pay was expanding soon to more South American countries. Now, it's finally available in Argentina and Peru.
articles.content:
At the beginning of the year, Apple teased Apple Pay availability in Argentina, Peru, and Chile as “coming soon.” Now, Apple’s payment system is finally available in Argentina and Peru.
